body: @keiya01 i think this could be an issue caused by `getValues()` fix?

@bluebill1049 
i think so too... i will fix this issue.

@keiya01 This is actually a tricky one, chicken, and egg situation. I guess that was the first reason why i didn't want to include getValues() to return default values. (perhaps check if there is nothing registered)

> @keiya01 This is actually a tricky one, chicken, and egg situation. I guess that was the first reason why i didn't want to include getValues() to return default values. (perhaps check if there is nothing registered)

Hmm, I think we should provide option about while `defaultValue` should be included in passed value from `getValues()` and `handleSubmit` or not. Because I think passed value from these method need to be equal.
@keiya01 `handleSubmit` we should use the `getFieldsValues` method and ignore the `defaultVlaues`.

> @keiya01 `handleSubmit` we should use the `getFieldsValues` method and ignore the `defaultVlaues`.

Hi @bluebill1049,
Will the field value of `watch` method be empty array? I currently use `useEffect` method to monitor the field value. If the field value is empty array by updating, I use `reset` to set the field value to empty array. This is a workaround solution.
Thanks, @chouandy we should fix this issue soon. üôè
